Affliction.name: Hunger
Affliction.description: The stomach is happy.

Affliction.name: Thirst
Affliction.description: You feel refreshed.

Affliction.name: Dying of thirst
Affliction.description: Dying of thirst.

Affliction.name: Alcoholic
Affliction.description: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.

Affliction.name: Alcohol withdrawal
Affliction.description: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of alcohol withdrawal.

Affliction.name: Cannibalism
Affliction.description: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.

Affliction.name: Hungry for Human Meat
Affliction.description: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, the eyes stare empty.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Lost their mind over human meat.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You lost your mind over human meat.

Affliction.name: Bladder
Affliction.description: You need to urinate.

Affliction.name: Need to defecate
Affliction.description: You need to take a dump.

Affliction.name: Hygiene
Affliction.description: You need to clean yourself.

Affliction.name: Disoriented
Affliction.description: Up is down and left is... right? Where am I?

Affliction.name: Stomach Ache
Affliction.description: The stomach hurts.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have choked on your own vomit.

Affliction.name: geneticextraction
Affliction.description: Genes being extracted.

Affliction.name: Butchered
Affliction.description: The corpse is being butchered for meat.

GiveTalentInfo.talentidentifiers: prodigy,downwiththeship,lonewolf, physicalconditioning,swole,beatcop, exampleofhealth,laresistance,drsubmarine, egghead,grounded,unstoppablecuriosity, ballastdenizen,miner,mudraptorwrestler, skedaddle,revengesquad,thewaitinglist

Affliction.name: Fill Bladder
Affliction.description: The bladder is filling.
